subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Steroids
Drug Abuse and Traffic
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Professional cycling is beginning its new season about where it finished the last one, with the consequences of the use of performance-enhancing drugs casting a broad shadow over the sport.
